title: 108: Making Everyday Your Wedding Day with Sahara Rose
itunes:title: 108: Making Everyday Your Wedding Day with Sahara Rose
description:
I just got engaged and wedding planning is NOT going as expected.. but it’s taught me this important lesson, which I’ll share with you on this episode.

-The realization I had while wedding planning.. and every brides NIGHTMARE that happened to me in Mexico
-Why people turn into bridezillas.. and how to avoid that
-Why we shouldn't live our lives planning for one special moment, yet making each moment special
-How to make everyday your wedding day

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Join my Awaken Your Powers Masterclass to become a leader in the new paradigm with Shaman Durek: https://www.iamsahararose.com/awaken-your-powers


Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz
